overview: Damage Goods is a comedy with serious heart. Twenty-one year old Delk was removed from his birth family and put in the care of gay foster carers David and John with whom he still lives. Twenty-three year old Josh has a girlfriend but has realized he is gay. Following a series of chance meetings the two find themselves in the same restaurant. After a promising first kiss and conversation, they leave alone and it is left up to Delk's friend Rowan to get the two together while he hooks himself up with Josh's ex-girlfriend in the process. Josh, Delk, Rowan and Jess must find their own way back to their hearts.
title: Damaged Goods
